Key Match Events: Shadab Khan was named Player of the Match for his all-round performance, scoring 36 runs off 26 balls and taking 1 wicket for 27 runs.
Naseem Shah hit two sixes in the final over to secure a thrilling victory for Pakistan by 1 wicket with 4 balls remaining.
Fazalhaq Farooqi took 3 wickets for 31 runs, including the crucial wickets of Babar Azam and Mohammad Nawaz.
Fareed Ahmad also took 3 wickets for 31 runs, including the key wicket of Asif Ali.
Rashid Khan took 2 wickets for 25 runs, including the wicket of Mohammad Rizwan.
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan won the toss and elected to field first.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Sharjah Cricket Stadium.
This was the 10th match of the Super Four stage in the Men's T20 Asia Cup 2022.
The match was officiated by umpires Anil Chaudhary and Jayaraman Madanagopal, with Gazi Sohel as the TV umpire and Andy Pycroft as the match referee.
